sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Turtwig
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Grotle
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Torterra
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Chimchar
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Monferno
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Infernape
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It uses a special kind of martial art involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Piplup
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a poor walker and often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Prinplup
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It lives alone, away from others. It is a proud Pokémon, and every Prinplup believes it is the most important.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Empoleon
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Starly
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: They flock in great numbers. Their shrill cries are so noisy that they become annoying.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Staravia
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Staraptor
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. It has a savage nature.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bidoof
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bibarel
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Kricketot
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Kricketune
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It crosses its arms to tune its calls. It is said to have the ability to compose melodies.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Shinx
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Luxio
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It rests its forelegs on others to communicate with them in pulses of electricity.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Luxray
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It has eyes which can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Budew
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The bud on its head closes in winter. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Roselia with high Happiness during the day.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Roserade
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Cranidos
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: A Pokémon that lived in jungles 100 million years ago. It has a skull that is as hard as iron.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Rampardos
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: Its skull is as hard as steel. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Shieldon
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a Pokémon that lived in jungles about 100 million years ago. It has a shield-like face.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bastiodon
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries. Its face is like a steel shield.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Burmy
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: To protect itself from the cold wind, it uses leaves and branches to cloak its body.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Wormadam
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Mothim
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It loves the nectar of flowers and will steal honey from a Combee.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Combee
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Vespiquen
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It raises its young in its body. The larvae are fed nectar collected by Combee.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Pachirisu
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Buizel
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It inflates the flotation sac on its neck to keep its face above water.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Floatzel
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Cherubi
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. It is very sweet and tasty.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Cherrim
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Shellos
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: Its color and shapes differ from region to region. It is a mystery as to why it has different forms.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Gastrodon
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Ambipom
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It uses its two tails to shell peanuts. It also uses them to create a ring to show affection.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Drifloon
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Drifblim
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It can heft an object weighing over 200 pounds. It is known to carry people and Pokémon away.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Buneary
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It can deliver powerful blows with its curled-up ears. It is very wary of danger.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Lopunny with high Happiness.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Lopunny
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a timid Pokémon that is always on the lookout for danger. It bounds away with light, bouncing steps.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Mismagius
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It appears as if from nowhere, uttering chants. Some have been known to cause happiness, others despair.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Honchkrow
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is the boss of Murkrow. It is said that it is a messenger of ill fortune.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Glameow
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a very fickle Pokémon, scratching within the blink of an eye.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Purugly
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon's nest and claims it as its own.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Chingling
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It emits cries by agitating an orb in its mouth. It moves by hopping.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Chimecho with high Happiness at night.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Stunky
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Skuntank
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bronzor
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is said that this Pokémon was dug up from the ground, where it had been sleeping for a long time.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bronzong
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is said that it can open portals to other worlds. It is an object of worship in some areas.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Bonsly
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a Pokémon that looks like a bonsai tree. It is often found in temperate climates.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Sudowoodo after learning Mimic.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Mime Jr.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It loves to mimic the actions of others. It is a popular Pokémon among children.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Mr. Mime after learning Mimic.

sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.name: Happiny
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.description: It loves to carry a round, white rock in its belly pouch. It is said that the rock brings good luck.
sinnoh_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Chansey while holding an Oval Stone during the day.
